a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Inequality of food consumption vs. GDP per capita, 2020
Inequality of food consumption is measured by the coefficient of variation in per capita caloric consumption.
Higher values represent larger levels of dietary inequality. GDP per capita is measured in constant
Coefficient of variation in calorie consumption
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations; World Bank (2023)
